verbs.description: < p > President Trump ’s attorneys [V: are] strategizing over how to handle a subpoena and prepare him for a sit - down with the special counsel.</p >

< p > President Trump ’s attorneys are strategizing over how to handle a subpoena and prepare him for a [V: sit] - down [ARGM-COM: with the] special counsel.</p >
